```{r message=FALSE}
library(BayesFactor)
```


### Repeated-measures ANOVA

```{r testing,tidy=FALSE}
data(puzzles)

bf = anovaBF(RT ~ shape*color + ID, data = puzzles, 
             whichRandom="ID", progress=FALSE)
bf
```

Figure 1

```{r testplot,fig.width=10,fig.height=5}
plot(bf)
```
